Query:
SELECT
				    sm.MDN,
				    p.PartnerCode,
				    b.MFSBillerCode,
				    count(*),
				    sum(ct.Amount)
				FROM				
				    service_charge_txn_log sctl
				    INNER JOIN commodity_transfer ct ON ct.ID = sctl.CommodityTransferID
				    INNER JOIN subscriber s ON ct.SourceSubscriberID = s.ID
				    INNER JOIN subscriber_mdn sm on sm.subscriberID = s.ID
				    INNER JOIN partner p ON p.SubscriberID = s.ID
				    INNER JOIN mfsbiller_partner_map bpm ON bpm.PartnerID = p.ID
				    INNER JOIN mfs_biller b ON bpm.MFSBillerId = b.ID
				WHERE
				    sctl.CreateTime >= ${StartTime}
				    AND sctl.CreateTime < ${EndTime}
					AND p.PartnerCode like ${PartnerCode}
				    AND b.MFSBillerCode like ${BillerCode}
				GROUP BY
				    p.PartnerCode
